analysis.description:
PlaykeyICO.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/4/0x26d08b9d227933a85e855656dc46ab889e183c88.sol#133-138) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(team,_value) (/unique_chucks/4/0x26d08b9d227933a85e855656dc46ab889e183c88.sol#138)

PKT.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/4/0x26d08b9d227933a85e855656dc46ab889e183c88.sol#476-482) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(where,_value) (/unique_chucks/4/0x26d08b9d227933a85e855656dc46ab889e183c88.sol#482)

Reentrancy in PlaykeyICO.mintPresaleTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0x26d08b9d227933a85e855656dc46ab889e183c88.sol#184-198):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(pkt.totalSupply() + _pktValue <= tokensForSale) (/unique_chucks/4/0x26d08b9d227933a85e855656dc46ab889e183c88.sol#193-194)
	- pkt.mint(_investor,_pktValue) (/unique_chucks/4/0x26d08b9d227933a85e855656dc46ab889e183c88.sol#194)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleSold (/unique_chucks/4/0x26d08b9d227933a85e855656dc46ab889e183c88.sol#194-198)
BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/4/0x26d08b9d227933a85e855656dc46ab889e183c88.sol#328-331) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/4/0x26d08b9d227933a85e855656dc46ab889e183c88.sol#279-282) should be declared external

StandardToken.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/4/0x26d08b9d227933a85e855656dc46ab889e183c88.sol#404-427) should be declared external
